faq.question: What is the best book for a beginner programmer?
faq.answer: For absolute beginners, we recommend starting with a book on Python, such as 'Python Crash Course'. It provides a solid foundation in programming fundamentals.

faq.question: Are there any books on productivity?
faq.answer: Yes, we highly recommend 'Atomic Habits' by James Clear and 'Deep Work' by Cal Newport. Both offer practical strategies for improving focus and building good habits.

products.title: 'Atomic Habits' by James Clear
products.description: An international bestseller that provides a proven framework for improving every day by building tiny, incremental habits.

products.title: 'The Pragmatic Programmer' by Andrew Hunt
products.description: A classic book for software developers that covers everything from personal responsibility to career development and architectural techniques.
